desc: 测试查询条件带列的表达式，如：c1 = c2 + 1
name: SelectColumnExprWhere

oqls.desc: 查询记录创建人等于本人的列表
oqls.name: SelectListWithCreateEqualsOwner
oqls.oql: select staffId, staffCode, staffName from Staff where creator.key = ownerKey
oqls.sql: select STA_ID, STA_CODE, STA_NAME from STAFF where CREATOR_KEY = OWNER_KEY
